es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics.basic

Class AverageRecommendationMetric<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics.AbstractSystemMetric<U,I>
      • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics.basic.AverageRecommendationMetric<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SystemMetric<U,I>

    public class AverageRecommendationMetric<U,I>
extends AbstractSystemMetric<U,I>
    Average of a recommendation metric: system metric based on the arithmetic mean of a recommendation metric for a set of users' recommendations.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AverageRecommendationMetric(RecommendationMetric<U,I> metric, boolean ignoreNaN)
      Constructor in which the average is calculated for all the recommendations added during the calculation.
      AverageRecommendationMetric(RecommendationMetric<U,I> metric, int numUsers)
      Constructor in which the number of users of the recommendation metric to be averaged is specified.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a recommendation to the metric.
      double addAndEvaluate(Recommendation<U,I> recommendation)
      Adds the recommendation metric to the average and returns the user value.
      void combine(SystemMetric<U,I> other)
      Combines the recommendations added to other system metric to this one.

      Evaluates the metric for the recommendations added so far.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AverageRecommendationMetric

        public AverageRecommendationMetric(RecommendationMetric<U,I> metric,
                                   int numUsers)
        Constructor in which the number of users of the recommendation metric to be averaged is specified. Recommendations returning NaN or missing recommendations are treated as zeros to the average.
        Parameters:
        metric - recommendation metric to be averaged
        numUsers - number of expected users' recommendations

      • AverageRecommendationMetric

        public AverageRecommendationMetric(RecommendationMetric<U,I> metric,
                                   boolean ignoreNaN)
        Constructor in which the average is calculated for all the recommendations added during the calculation.
        Parameters:
        metric - recommendation metric to be averaged
        ignoreNaN - ignore NaNs from the calculation of the average?
